indications: Kidney Deficiency with nocturnal emissions, spermatorrhea, vaginal discharge and urinary frequency

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with uncleared External pathogens.

interactions: This herb significantly counteracts cycloheximide-induced amnesia. Its effects are amplified by treatment with serotonergic receptor antagonists and reduced by serotonergic agonists, GAB(A) and cholinergic receptor antagonists.

notes: Wu Wei Zi means five flavor fruit.
The peel and pulp are sweet and sour.
The kernel is pungent and bitter.
This herb inhibits the leakage of Lung Qi above and enriches Kidney Yin below, thus effectively treating coughs.
This herb is frequently used for various types of insomnia.
Because it is astringent, it Nourishes the Yin of the five organs.
By nourishing the Kidney and Liver Yin, it strengthens sinews and bones and brightens eyes.
Contemporary studies are showing that this herb has restorative effects on the brain and central nervous system.
It modulates endocrine and immune functions by tonifying the adrenal cortex and Liver.
Southern Schisandra Nan Wu Wei Zi does not tonify, gut regulates Qi, transforms Dampness and reduces Phlegm and is useful for Externally contracted Cold and wheezing due to Phlegm
Dry-fried Schisandra Chao Wu Wei Zi, has enhanced ability to enrich Kidneys and tonify Deficiency and is used in treatment of Spleen and Kidney Deficiency with daybreak diarrhea.
Prepared Schisandra Zhi Wu Wei Zi, has increased tonification properties.
Wine Prepared Schisandra Jiu Zhi Wu Wei Zi enriches the Kidneys.
Vinegar Prepared Schisandra Cu Zhi Wu Wei Zi has increased astringent properties

Both Wu Wei Zi and Fr. Mume #{WuMei} Wu Mei astringe the Lungs, generate fluids and bind up the Intestines. Wu Wei Zi more powerfully astringes Lung Qi to stop coughs while at the same time, strengthens Lung Qi, grasps Kidney Qi, astringes Essence and sweat and calms the Spirit. Wu Mei more strongly generates fluids and alleviates thirst. It also harmonizes the Stomach and eliminates roundworms. It is important in treating irregular uterine bleeding or Hematuria.
